FuncDef:
The description command in the traffic classifier view, you can add a description to the current traffic classifier to indicate the specific configuration and use of the traffic classifier.
The undo description command deletes the description of the traffic classifier.
By default, there is no description adding for the current configured traffic classifier.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the use of the traffic classifier.
The value is a string of 1 to 127 case-sensitive characters that may include spaces.

Examples: [*HUAWEI-classifier-tc1] description This classifier is a test traffic classifier
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
If the name of a traffic classifier cannot provide the detailed information about the traffic classifier, you can add the detailed information through the description command.
Prerequisites
A traffic classifier is defined and the traffic classifier view is displayed.
